author: 56cdab144f85abfb36c6c089
summary: Audio reverb using an impulse response (sample)

ports.name: audio in
ports.text: The audio signal to apply the convolution on

ports.name: impulse response
ports.text: The audio file used for the convolution. Must use the same [sample rate](https://developer.mozilla.org/de/docs/Web/API/AudioContext/sampleRate) as the audio context (44100 in most cases).

ports.name: normalize
ports.text: When set to true, the impulse response will be normalized.

ports.name: audio out
ports.text: The convolver applied to the audio input
